Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2016...
Earned first career win on 5/2/2017...
Had first career hit on 5/19/2019, off Hisashi Iwakuma (LAN)...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/26/2022 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/7/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
